What are the treatments for trisomy 18 ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of trisomy 18:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Complete trisomy 18 syndrome  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Trisomy 18   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surger
